actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime and Federal Government Surveillance

official_title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide for punishment for killing a member of the Armed Forces of the United States.
short_title: Captain Scott Corwin Armed Forces Protection Act of 2009

summary.text: Captain Scott Corwin Armed Forces Protection Act of 2009 - Amends the federal criminal code to: (1) provide enhanced criminal penalties for killing, or conspiring or attempting to kill, any member of the Armed Forces; and (2) add as an aggravating factor in death penalty deliberations the killing of a member of the Armed Forces.

titles.title: Captain Scott Corwin Armed Forces Protection Act of 2009
To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide for punishment for killing a member of the Armed Forces of the United States.
